home.text: I am junior developer web, I am from Colombia, I am 23 years old and I work as a Frontend and Backend developer. I really like to design and layout before moving on to code but the truth is i enjoy every part of the process.

habilities.title: Skills are important, but not all of them have to be technical
habilities.p: In my career as a web developer, I not only stand out for my solid technical skills, but also for my soft skills that enrich my contribution to the team. My ability to communicate effectively facilitates understanding of client needs, while my collaborative approach ensures seamless integration with teammates.

footer.t: If you want to contact me, leave me a message!
